name: infarction
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process in which tissue dies because something has blocked its blood supply, or an occasion on which this happens: A myocardial infarction happens when the blood flow to a part of the heart is blocked for a long enough time that part of the heart muscle is damaged.
